Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ConnectionManagerSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ConnectionManagerSocket
public class ConnectionManagerSocket
extends java.lang.Object
ConnectionManagerSocket manages client connection to Server. It initializes client with starting parameter: nickname, color and card. It knows BoardGUI, if player is using GUI, or ClientCLIMain if player is using CLI. It is one per each connection client.
